            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>d1045749-ebcd-4a9c-b41e-1124b1b7fd90#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A Ross-jég</string>
            <string language="en">The Ross-Ice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Ross-Eis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Ross-Glace</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Ross-Gelo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Ross-Ghiaccio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Ross-pa'gos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Ross-Hielo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Ross-jég az Antarktiszon, a Victoria-földtől keletre</string>
            <string language="en">The Ross-Ice on the Antarctic, at East from Victoria land</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">antarktisz, jég, ross, ross jég, ross-jég</string>
            <string language="en">Antarctic, ice, Ross, Ross Ice, Ross-Ice</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Ross-Eis auf der Antarktis, am Osten vom 
Victoria Land</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Ross-Glace sur l'ANTARCTIQUE, à l'est de la 
terre de Victoria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Ross-Gelo no antarctic, no leste da terra de 
Victoria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Ross-Ghiaccio sull'ANTARTIDE, all'est dalla 
terra della Victoria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Ross-pa'gos στην ανταρκτική, στην ανατολή από το 
έδαφος Βικτώριας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Ross-Hielo en el antártico, en el este de la 
pista de Victoria</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Antarktis, Eis, Ross, Ross Eis, Ross-Eis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ANTARCTIQUE, glace, Ross, glace de Ross, Ross-Glace</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Antarctic, gelo, Ross, gelo de Ross, Ross-Gelo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ANTARTIDE, ghiaccio, Ross, ghiaccio di Ross, 
Ross-Ghiaccio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανταρκτική, πάγος, Ross, Ross Ice, Ross-pa'gos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Antártico, hielo, Ross, hielo de Ross, Ross-Hielo</string>
          </keyword>
